snippet: Ellis, who coached the United States to the Women’s World Cup title last month, agreed to a new multiyear contract to guide the Americans, the United States Soccer Federation said Wednesday.
abstract: United States women's soccer coach Jill Ellis agrees to multiyear contract extension; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Ellis, who coached the United States to the Women’s World Cup title last month, agreed to a new multiyear contract to guide the Americans, the United States Soccer Federation said Wednesday.

headline.main: Jill Ellis Gets New Contract to Coach U.S. Women’s Team

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: United States Women's National Soccer Team
